name: SNATCHED!
description:
Made for Mini Jam 99: "Birds"
Limitation is "Can't Stop Moving!"

Controls:
Left Click to duck
When the birds snatches your wig, Left Click on the bird to retrieve your wig!

Made with Unity and Playmaker
Music made with BeepBox
Art made in PixAki and Aseprite
UI made with UI Builder from Unity Asset Store
Particle Effect taken from Cartoon FX from Unity Asset Store
Bird sound taken from Freesound.org
